welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bailleston, a charming town in the United Kingdom known for its friendly locals and stunning landscapes. We invite you to immerse yourself in our city's charm and explore all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glasgow International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Glasgow International Airport serves as a hub for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edinburgh Airport, serving domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Edinburgh Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 2-hour time limit per session

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Prestwick Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Prestwick Airport is equipped to handle various types of cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.
